titleInfo.title: REDUCING DHS ACQUISITION COST GROWTH ACT

extension.searchTitle: REDUCING DHS ACQUISITION COST GROWTH ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 48

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Reducing DHS Acquisition Cost Growth Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 1294, to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to provide for congressional notification regarding major acquisition program breaches, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 408 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 173;

titleInfo.title: DHS MULTIYEAR ACQUISITION STRATEGY ACT OF 2017

extension.searchTitle: DHS MULTIYEAR ACQUISITION STRATEGY ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 48

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: DHS Multiyear Acquisition Strategy Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 1249, amended, to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to require a multiyear acquisition strategy of the Department of Homeland Security, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 409 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 174; and

extension.searchTitle: DHS ACQUISITION AUTHORITIES ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 48

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 1252, amended, to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to provide for certain acquisition authorities for the Under Secretary of Management of the Department of Homeland Security, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 407 yeas to 1 nay, Roll No. 175.
